response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself. Given its worth to you, I propose a transaction price of $950,000. This figure encapsulates not only the intrinsic value of the product but also reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial exchange. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and interests.", "product_price": 950000}
